lines.text: ...So. You and me, huh?
Anything you want to say?
...Why did you help him?
...Que?
Fleini. Why did you take his side?
Uh… why’d I do my job?
If you want to put it like that. You’re only being- being forced to do this because of him, right?
He’s the one who caught you and put an end to your… magical mayhem.
Heheh, yeah, he got me good.
So- so, don’t you hate him?
...Not really. He’s the one who kept me out of jail, too.
So you could be his p-personal lackey, sure.
You think it was out of the g- the g-goodness of his heart?
I mean, I guess not, but it was sort of a win-win.
You don’t… you didn’t want any- any revenge on him?
He’s pretty chill for a cop, honestly. So, no, I’m not feeling it.
...You don’t know what he’s like.
If you- if you knew the real- you don’t know!
Man, I don’t know if I can trust you to be objective about that.
...Hmph.
We… aren’t going to see- to- to see eye-to-eye, yet.
You- you’d better watch your back, Seeker.
You’re dead- you’re dead meat, if you get in my way.
Is that so?
...Well. Not if you get in his way, first.
I’ll- I’ll say it again. Watch yourself, wizard.
